name: Heuristic Review Components
description:
Design Annotations Kit with Jakob's 10 Heuristics for User Interfaces.


Document your heuristic reviews or usability feedback in a systemic and easy-to-consume format.


'Instructions' and 'example of use' coming soon. In the meantime, utilise and use as it fits. Feel free to share your feedback. ‚úåüèΩ
